view.menu.components

Class FadingLabel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JLabel
            • view.menu.components.FadingLabel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants

    public class FadingLabel
extends javax.swing.JLabel
    This is a custom JLabel with a Fade-In effect. Idea from: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/24159510/multiple-jlabel-fade-in-effect-one-at-a-time
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
